PAD_ViewAtDaylight.synopsis: When players arrive at the docks, under Karlach's Tavern, with Astarion in the party, this VB will be triggered.
PAD_ViewAtDaylight.how_to_trigger: Entering S_LOW_Docks_VB_ViewInDaylight_d95ca39a-d048-4931-9476-a330b469af72 with Astarion in the party.

PAD_ViewAtDaylight_0.speaker: Player
PAD_ViewAtDaylight_0.text: I've never been here during the day. I'm not sure sunlight does it any favours.

PAD_ViewAtDaylight_1.speaker: Player
PAD_ViewAtDaylight_1.text: The harbour is at its most splendid when the sun is high! The light dances on the water, the sails snap crisply in the breeze, and the smell of the fish-heads is sweet as berries!
